mapper.insert: insert into program (id_pgm, id_cate, pgm_name, st_dt, end_dt, pgm_target, id_room, pgm_method, pgm_per, pgm_fee) values (#{idPgm},#{idCate},#{pgmName},#{stDt},#{endDt}, #{pgmTarget},#{idRoom},#{pgmMethod},#{pgmPer},#{pgmFee})
mapper.update:
update program set pgm_name = #{pgmName}, id_cate = #{idCate}, pgm_name = #{pgmName}, st_dt=#{stDt}, end_dt=#{endDt}, pgm_target=#{pgmTarget}, id_room=#{idRoom}, pgm_method=#{pgmMethod}, pgm_per=#{pgmPer}, pgm_fee=#{pgmFee}
where id_pgm = #{idPgm}
